titleStmt.title: The countrey-minister's reflections on the city-ministers letter to his friend shewing the reasons why we cannot read the King's declaration in our churches.
titleStmt.author: Countrey minister.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Reyner & W. Faulkner ...,

notesStmt.note: Pages 1 and 8 are stained in filmed copy. Beginning-end photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
